testcase.name: Validating the dropdown values
testcase.system-out: Given the user is in Asset details screen...................................passed When the user selects values from the dropdowns.............................passed Then the user should be able to see the result based on the selection of values.passed

testcase.name: Validating the master assets
testcase.system-out: Given the user is in Asset details page.....................................passed When the user selects master option from the dropdown.......................passed Then the user should be able to see all the master assets which is linked and not linked to product badges.passed

testcase.name: Validating the loader
testcase.system-out: Given the user is in Asset details page.....................................passed When the user selects values from the dropdowns and clicks on view button...passed Then user should be able to see the loader..................................passed

testcase.name: Validating the valid search functionality
testcase.system-out: Given the user is in Asset details page.....................................passed When the user selects values from the dropdowns and clicks on view button...passed And the user search for any asset...........................................passed Then the user should be able to get the result based on the search..........passed

testcase.name: Validating the invalid search functioanlity
testcase.system-out: Given the user is in Asset details page.....................................passed When the user selects values from the dropdowns and clicks on view button...passed And the user search for any invalid asset...................................passed Then user should be able to get the message as "No records found"...........passed

testcase.name: Validating the clear search icon presence
testcase.system-out: Given the user is in Asset details page.....................................passed When the user selects values from the dropdowns and clicks on view button...passed And the user search starts typing text inside the search field..............passed Then the clear selection icon should appear.................................passed
